titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the levying and payment of the ship-moneys in arreare
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Given at the Court at Whitehall, the twentieth day of August, in the sixteenth yeer of His Majesties Reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
